text:
Clarence J. "Bud" Brown Jr. (born June 18, 1927) is an American publisher and politician. He is a former Republican United States Representative from the 7th District of Ohio, serving from 1965 to 1983.
Appointed by President Ronald Reagan, he also served as the United States Deputy Secretary of Commerce and Acting Secretary of Commerce, in total from 1983 to 1988.
He is the father of actor Clancy Brown.
